data.message: Thank you Facebook because of you I feel more connected with my family and friends and meet new amazing friends God bless you all

replies.message: You're welcome, Maria! We're glad you are able to connect with your friends and family. -Neha

Thank you Facebook for helping us spread the word of the location & cause of our Thrifty Sparrow Resale Shop which totally benefits Hospice. Your site has expanded our contact with 
Many people who did not know about our shop & it's purpose.
( تازہ ترین خبروں سے بروقت باخبر رہنے کیلئے پیج لائیک کریں ) facebook.com/Pak-Taiz-News-803064769803445/

Wait until to get blocked and asked for your government ID. My Mom, 61 years of age doesn't really know how the www works but I tried to set up a Facebook profile for her. I live in Australia she on the other side of the world. She loved to see my pictures and everything until she were blocked by Facebook for no reason. Facebook is trying to get government IDs from everyone. This is ridiculous. So my Mother who do not want to send sensitivr data to a none government authority like Facebook to get verified. And you have no option like getting certified by a phone number. What's better a verification by a real phone number or a picture which you can easily fake.
